argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lhpocat.o | |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lhpocat.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 3 |  | lhpocat.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> W e. H ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_lhpbase | |- ( W e. H -> W e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 1, 2, 3 | #P_lhpoc | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( W e. H <-> ( ._|_ ` W ) e. A ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( W e. H <-> ( ._|_ ` W ) e. A ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( ._|_ ` W ) e. A ) |
